TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DisplayAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class DisplayAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class DisplayAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 提供允许为实体分部类的类型和成员指定可本地化字符串的通用特性。

span.span: Provides a general-purpose attribute that lets you specify localizable strings for types and members of entity partial classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类的属性可用作指定实例的文本或资源标识符 。The properties of this class can be used either as literals or as resource identifiers for a specified instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数将 、 、 和属性初始化 为空字符串。The constructor initializes the , , , and properties to an empty string.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应自动生成用户界面以显示此字段。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether UI should be generated automatically in order to display this field.

value.span: 如果应自动生成用户界面以显示此字段，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if UI should be generated automatically to display this field; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不要使用此属性访问 属性。Do not use this property to access the property. 请改用 方法。Use the method instead.

member this.AutoGenerateFilter : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否针对此字段自动显示筛选。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether filtering UI is automatically displayed for this field.

value.span: 如果应自动生成用户界面以显示此字段的筛选，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if UI should be generated automatically to display filtering for this field; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不要使用此属性获取属性的值 。Do not use this property to get the value of the property. 请改用 方法。Use the method instead. 设置此属性将重写默认行为，以指定作为筛选器包括的列。Setting this property overrides the default behavior for specifying which columns are included as filters. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何对 Employee1 字段禁用筛选器。The following example shows how to disable the filter for the Employee1 field. ```csharp [MetadataType(typeof(EmployeeMD))] public partial class Employee { public class EmployeeMD { [Display(Name = "Last Name", Order = -9, Prompt = "Enter Last Name", Description="Emp Last Name")] public object LastName { get; set; } [Display(Name = "Manager", AutoGenerateFilter=false)] public object Employee1 { get; set; } } } ``` ```vb _ Public Class Employee Public Class EmployeeMD _ Public Property LastName As Object End Property _ Public Property Employee1 As Object End Property End Class End Class ```

exception.span: 在设置属性值之前，已尝试获取该属性值。

span.span: An attempt was made to get the property value before it was set.

member this.Description : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值用于在用户界面中显示说明。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that is used to display a description in the UI.

value.span: 用于在用户界面中显示说明的值。

span.span: The value that is used to display a description in the UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不要使用此属性获取属性的值 。Do not use this property to get the value of the property. 请改用 方法。Use the method instead. 属性通常用作工具提示或说明 UI 元素，该元素是使用此特性绑定到成员的。The property is typically used as a tooltip or description UI element that is bound to the member using this attribute. 动态数据编辑 .ascx 模板会将说明作为工具提示显示在文本输入字段中。The Dynamic Data Edit.ascx template will display the description as a tooltip in text-entry fields. `null`值或空字符串有效。A `null` value or empty string is valid. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. ```csharp [MetadataType(typeof(EmployeeMD))] public partial class Employee { public class EmployeeMD { [Display(Name = "Last Name", Order = -9, Prompt = "Enter Last Name", Description="Emp Last Name")] public object LastName { get; set; } [Display(Name = "Manager", AutoGenerateFilter=false)] public object Employee1 { get; set; } } } ``` ```vb _ Public Class Employee Public Class EmployeeMD _ Public Property LastName As Object End Property _ Public Property Employee1 As Object End Property End Class End Class ```

returns.span: 如果已设置 属性，则为该属性的值；否则为 。

span.span: The value of the property, if it has been set; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定顺序，表示层应考虑将属性的值设置 为10000。If an order is not specified, presentation layers should consider setting the value of the property to 10000. 此值允许在未指定顺序的字段之前和之后显示显式排序的字段。This value lets explicitly-ordered fields be displayed before and after the fields that do not have a specified order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 短名称用作 UI 元素的网格列标签，该元素绑定到使用此属性批注的属性。The short name is used as the grid column label for a UI element that is bound to the property that is annotated with this attribute. 如果不是，则此属性返回文本、非本地化字符串或已本地化的字符串 `null` 。This property returns either the literal, non-localized string, or a localized string if is not `null`.

value.span: 用于在用户界面中对字段进行分组的值。

span.span: A value that is used to group fields in the UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不要使用此属性获取属性的值 。Do not use this property to get the value of the property. 请改用 方法。Use the method instead. `null`值或空字符串有效。A `null` value or empty string is valid.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值用于在用户界面中进行显示。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that is used for display in the UI.

value.span: 用于在用户界面中进行显示的值。

span.span: A value that is used for display in the UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不要使用此属性获取属性的值 。Do not use this property to get the value of the property. 请改用 方法。Use the method instead. 该名称通常用作 UI 元素的字段标签，该元素绑定到使用此属性批注的属性。The name is typically used as the field label for a UI element that is bound to the property that is annotated with this attribute. 动态数据的 ListDetails、.aspx 和 .aspx 页面模板使用 字段标签的属性。The Dynamic Data List.aspx, ListDetails.aspx, and Details.aspx page templates use the property for the field label. `null`值或空字符串有效。A `null` value or empty string is valid. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 name 属性。The following example shows how to set the name property. ```csharp [MetadataType(typeof(EmployeeMD))] public partial class Employee { public class EmployeeMD { [Display(Name = "Last Name", Order = -9, Prompt = "Enter Last Name", Description="Emp Last Name")] public object LastName { get; set; } [Display(Name = "Manager", AutoGenerateFilter=false)] public object Employee1 { get; set; } } } ``` ```vb _ Public Class Employee Public Class EmployeeMD _ Public Property LastName As Object End Property _ Public Property Employee1 As Object End Property End Class End Class ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Order { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Order : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置列的排序权重。

span.span: Gets or sets the order weight of the column.
The order weight of the column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列按顺序值按照升序排序。Columns are sorted in increasing order based on the order value. 没有此属性的列的顺序值为0。Columns without this attribute have an order value of 0. 负值有效，可用于在所有非负值列之前放置列。Negative values are valid and can be used to position a column before all non-negative columns. 如果未指定顺序，表示层应考虑使用值10000。If an order is not specified, presentation layers should consider using the value 10000. 此值允许在未指定顺序的字段之前和之后显示显式排序的字段。This value lets explicitly-ordered fields be displayed before and after the fields that do not have a specified order. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将 LastName 字段的订单权重设置为-9。The following example shows how to set the order weight of the LastName field to -9. 实体中的其他字段的默认订单权重为零。The other fields in the entity have the default order weight of zero. 因此，"LastName" 字段将首先显示。Therefore, the LastName field will be displayed first. ```csharp [MetadataType(typeof(EmployeeMD))] public partial class Employee { public class EmployeeMD { [Display(Name = "Last Name", Order = -9, Prompt = "Enter Last Name", Description="Emp Last Name")] public object LastName { get; set; } [Display(Name = "Manager", AutoGenerateFilter=false)] public object Employee1 { get; set; } } } ``` ```vb _ Public Class Employee Public Class EmployeeMD _ Public Property LastName As Object End Property _ Public Property Employee1 As Object End Property End Class End Class ```

exception.span: 已调用此属性的 getter，但尚未使用资源库显式设置其值。

span.span: The getter of this property has been invoked but its value has not been explicitly set using the setter.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Prompt { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Prompt : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值将用于为用户界面中的提示设置水印。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that will be used to set the watermark for prompts in the UI.

value.span: 将用于在用户界面中显示水印的值。

span.span: A value that will be used to display a watermark in the UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性通常用作 UI 元素的提示或水印，该 UI 元素绑定到使用此属性批注的属性。This property is typically used as a prompt or watermark for a UI element that is bound to the property that is annotated with this attribute. 不要使用此方法访问提示字符串。Do not use this method to access the prompt string. 请改用 方法。Use the method instead. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将属性设置 为 "输入姓氏"。The following example shows how to set the property to "Enter Last Name". ```csharp [MetadataType(typeof(EmployeeMD))] public partial class Employee { public class EmployeeMD { [Display(Name = "Last Name", Order = -9, Prompt = "Enter Last Name", Description="Emp Last Name")] public object LastName { get; set; } [Display(Name = "Manager", AutoGenerateFilter=false)] public object Employee1 { get; set; } } } ``` ```vb _ Public Class Employee Public Class EmployeeMD _ Public Property LastName As Object End Property _ Public Property Employee1 As Object End Property End Class End Class ```

member this.ResourceType : Type with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置包含 、、 和 属性的资源的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type that contains the resources for the , , , and properties.

value.span: 包含 、、 和 属性的资源的类型。

span.span: The type of the resource that contains the , , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此值为 `null` ，则 假定、、 和 属性为文本、非本地化字符串。If this value is `null`, the , , , and properties are assumed to be literal, non-localized strings. 如果此值不为 `null` ，则将字符串属性假定为公共静态属性的名称，这些属性将返回实际字符串值。If this value is not `null`, the string properties are assumed to be the names of public static properties that return the actual string value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ShortName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ShortName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于网格列标签的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that is used for the grid column label.
A value that is for the grid column label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 短名称用作 UI 元素的网格列标签，该元素绑定到使用此属性批注的属性。The short name is used as the grid column label for a UI element that is bound to the property that is annotated with this attribute. 动态数据的 "插入 .aspx" 和 "编辑 .aspx" 页模板 为字段标签使用。The Dynamic Data Insert.aspx and Edit.aspx page templates use the for the field label. 如果 已指定属性并且 属性表示一个资源键，则此属性返回的本地化字符串。This property returns the localized string for if the property has been specified and if the property represents a resource key. 如果 未指定属性 ，或属性不是资源键，则此属性返回非本地化字符串。If the property has not been specified or if the property is not a resource key, this property returns a non-localized string.
